localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
nodes.title: Gawq - Unbreaking news. Stay informed, mindfully.
nodes.author: Joshua Dziabiak

nodes.excerpt: Zeta Joint Cards are designed for the modern couple. Couples get a joint account and two debit cards, allowing both partners to keep tabs on their shared finances including paying bills and saving together. Our goal is to make shared banking delightful.
nodes.title: Zeta Joint Cards - Shared banking for modern couples
nodes.author: Charles Hudson

nodes.excerpt: KooKit is a breakthrough MagSafe accessory that cools your phone while keeping it wirelessly charged. It tweaks between battery life and performance of your phone to make it run at its peak state for a prolonged period of time.
nodes.title: KooKit - Keep your phone cool & wirelessly charge at the same time
nodes.author: Samuel alex ğŸ”¥

nodes.excerpt: Our 1-click video call platform enables the end customer to call the business with zero friction. Visual engagement creates trust, facilitates the transaction, accelerates sales, improves satisfaction. Make real-time video an integral part of your solutions.
nodes.title: 11Sight - 1-click video calls for customers on your product or website
nodes.author: Dr. Aleks Gollu

nodes.excerpt: Squat is also called full squat. It is one of the most complex and practiced movements in bodybuilding. It is also a movement in powerlifting competitions. This is an app that automatically records the number of squats through sensors.
nodes.title: Daily Squat Workout App - Fitness app to track your squat workout
nodes.author: Nine

nodes.excerpt: CyberCat VPN is Your Unlimited, Encrypted, Fast & Ad Free VPN for iPhone & iPad. Welcome to a new world of internets with a super fast and secure no log VPN. Bring down the virtual walls and pounce on all the content you can handle.
nodes.title: CyberCat VPN - A privacy focused, Ad blocking, Unlimited VPN for iOS. Meow
nodes.author: James Stanley

nodes.excerpt: Planetary is a social media app built upon the idea of protocols not platforms. Users and creators own their identities and social relationships. Privacy is respected and creators supported. Abuse and harassment is handled through community governance.
nodes.title: Planetary - Decentralized social media by and for the people.
nodes.author: rabble

nodes.excerpt: Create beautiful widgets and open playlists, videos, documents, contacts, songs, tweets and many things from the home screen
nodes.title: Widgetarian - Create beautiful widgets and more
nodes.author: TheAfricanNerd

nodes.excerpt: Recursive is a puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming. It is the perfect game for people who love hard puzzles. Your goal is to help little robots collect all gems by finding the correct pattern and translating it into a short program.
nodes.title: Recursive! - A puzzle game about recursion, patterns, and programming.
nodes.author: Saber Chaabani

nodes.excerpt: Still is designed to help you relieve symptoms of Anxiety and OCD. Using targeted messages to help pull your focus out of your anxiety or OCD as well as breathing exercises, Still helps you avoid the worst of your condition and stop it from taking hold.
nodes.title: Still - An app to help relieve symptoms of anxiety & OCD
nodes.author: Tom Norton

nodes.excerpt: Heart Reports V2 can generate separate blood sugar, blood pressure, blood oxygen, heart rate, activity and sleep reports. All perfectly designed for printing, so you can easily show your Apple Health data to your doctor. Now with Widgets and Shortcuts support.
nodes.title: Heart Reports v2 - Export beautiful PDF health reports from the iOS Health app
nodes.author: Viszt PÃ©ter

nodes.excerpt: Pocket self-care assistant that helps you stay positive and avoid negativity. JOI is a perfect tool for keeping a mood journal in a simple and funny way. Observe the correlation between your mood and activities during the day to see the patterns in your life.
nodes.title: JOI: Mood Tracker & Self-care Journal - A pocket self-care assistant that makes you feel happier
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Trexy allows you to track your own expenses. You can also track lending and borrowing records between your family and friends. Multi-currency comes in handy regardless of which currency you spend on. Expenses are grouped by category in monthly pie-chart.
nodes.title: Trexy - Track expenses and debts easily with multi-currency support.
nodes.author: Meng Taing

nodes.excerpt: Share your websites, products, social pages, and more, all in one link with Bio Sites from Unfold. You have more than one link, your bio should too. Available in Unfold on iOS and Android.
nodes.title: Bio Sites by Unfold - Share your links. Connect with your audience.
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
nodes.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
nodes.author: Molly Waldron

nodes.excerpt: Scan anything: objects, people, pets, text, books, and documents. Scan Thing uses cutting-edge machine learning and computer-vision algorithms. You don't need internet access, an account, or a subscription. There's no data collection, no ads, and no nonsense.
nodes.title: Scan Thing - Quickest way to capture and save anything around you
nodes.author: Pierre Liebenberg

nodes.excerpt: WellSpeak is a mobile app that helps you to become confident in your English speaking skills. AI and smart algorithms will help you with pronunciation and show how easy it is to speak like a native ğŸ˜"
nodes.title: WellSpeak - Practice your English to speak fluently, easily, confidently
nodes.author: Pavlo Pedenko

nodes.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
nodes.title: Planmesh - The easiest way to plan with friends
nodes.author: Jose Togbe

nodes.excerpt: Daily prompts and inspiration to get your creativity flowing, and a wonderful community of artists to support you as you grow. I made it to get my mum to start drawing again, and now we get over 1000 submissions a day! Available on iOS and Android
nodes.title: Sketch a Day: artist community & prompts - Daily prompts, powered by our positive community of artists
nodes.author: Tom Hicks

nodes.excerpt: Everyone has a secret they want to hide."Banana" will be your reliable friend. With Banana, you can manage all your secrets such as videos, photos, web links. that you don't want anyone to see. Banana provide you a delicious experience with a clean design.
nodes.title: Banana - Keep your secrets hidden and safe.
nodes.author: Packn

nodes.excerpt: Synced with calendar, MeetingRule displays the real-time availability of any space and lets you book it directly from the device. This helps start any meeting on time, finish it in time, eliminate unnecessary meetings, and boost the corporate productivity.
nodes.title: MeetingRule - Office space bookings simplified. It just syncs.
nodes.author: Samuel alex ğŸ”¥

nodes.excerpt: Bullet is a mobile and web app that helps you manage your tasks & events, and write your journal all in the same place. Inspired by the popular Bullet Journaling methodology.
nodes.title: Bullet Mobile - Manage your tasks, events and journal all on your mobile.
nodes.author: Hamish Johnson

nodes.excerpt: Use multiple camera devices to capture and create astonishing life moments with SYYNCC. Whether youâ€™re into extreme sports, or parties, now you and your friends can use your imagination and turn the craziest video ideas into life.
nodes.title: SYYNCC - Multicam video collage to create and share videos together
nodes.author: Alexander Plyuto

nodes.excerpt: Essentially, Squat-O-Meter is a mobile app that promises a whole lot of fun by taking users to the ex-Soviet streets and teaching them how to Slav squat. The app uses pose estimation technology good enough to detect and estimate the userâ€™s positions/movements while squatting.
nodes.title: Squat-O-Meter - Squat like a gopnik in the ex-USSR streets.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: All Hands is a collection of 25 high res photos, featuring hands of all shades, shapes, and sizes, holding iOS devices. Download the layered PSD mockups, add your screens, and diversify how you present your work.
nodes.title: The All Hands Collection - Diversify your product mockups
nodes.author: Jacques H. Bastien
